about_the_game:
TRAFFIC is a fictional story inspired by my own personal experiences, various news articles, statistics, and national incidents that remain unexplained.


TRAFFIC is a First-Person Psychological Horror game about a troubled child in a home where he must deal with both internal and external stresses. You will communicate with your parents, do your chores, and stay out of the way.

Secure the front gate and lock your doors. You never know who might be out there.



TRAFFIC is about a family living in Wyoming as they traverse through the economic recession of 2008. You play as the single child in a family of three, along with your Mother and Father.

Experience the gut-wrenching tension and horrifying story of TRAFFIC as you make your way through the days, doing whatever you can to take your mind off of the traumatic events occurring.

Piece the story together as you notice tiny details within the dialogue and environments.



Huge thanks to Unrested / Inksmith for creating the Art of 'Mother' used in this game. You can check him out on YouTube @Unrested or at @Inksmith

Huge thanks to Bazookya for creating an entire TV show segment. You can check him out on Twitch @ Bazookya

Huge thanks to Monk for taking my terrible MIDI music and producing it into something useful and awesome.

Unreal Retro Shaders / DaveFace

Rest of credits in game


This game contains subject matter not suitable for those susceptible to the following themes:

Implications of Domestic Abuse
Implications of Suicide
Gore
Sleep Paralysis
Home Invasions

content_descriptors.notes:
Graphic Violence
Domestic Violence
Self-Harm
Gore

name: TRAFFIC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590T @ 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You might have FPS issues if using integrated graphics processors made before 2015.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6600k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: TRAFFIC is an Atmospheric First-Person Psychological Horror game about a troubled child in a home where he must deal with both internal and external stresses. You will communicate with your parents, do your chores, and stay out of the way.
